questionTitle: His wife does not weigh so .................. as he ..................
The mother looked .............. at her naughty child.
It ............. every day so far this week.
Do you believe that ghosts .................?
The accident .................. while he was driving to the office.
Why don't you buy bananas when they are much ............ apples?
He speaks ................ good English that it is a pleasure to talk to him.
She got so .................. while watching the game that she began shouting.
When I was a child, my parents wouldn't .............. me stay out later than 9 o'clock in the evenings.
When my father died, I had no ..................... but to leave school and get a job .
He was ............... with robbery.
Liberace has a swimming-pool in his garden in the ............... of a piano.
The next ................. of the school play will be on Monday at 6.30 p.m.
The thief was ................. to six months' imprisonment.
Don't tell ................ about this.
During Christmas week there will be so many things in the shops that it will be difficult to know what .....................
we were driving in the country!
If it ................ , the match will be postponed .
I hope you don't mind  ............... to come and meet her.
Wedding-rings are usually made of ....................
